Class cLoggingDecorator

java.lang.Object
Logging.cLoggingBase
Logging.cLoggingDecorator
Direct Known Subclasses:
cLoggingConsole, cLoggingFile
public class cLoggingDecorator extends cLoggingBase
A decorator implementation for logging that wraps another logger. This class implements the Decorator pattern, allowing multiple loggers to be chained together. Each decorator can add additional functionality while delegating the actual logging to the wrapped logger instance.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • Log

      public void Log(String message, cLoggingBase.eLogLevel level)
      Logs a message by delegating to the wrapped logger. If no wrapped logger is set, the message is not logged.
      Specified by:
      Log in class cLoggingBase
      Parameters:
      message - the message to log
      level - the level at which to log the message

    • SetWrapped

      public void SetWrapped(cLoggingBase logger)
      Sets the wrapped logger instance.
      Parameters:
      logger - the new logger to wrap and delegate to

    • GetWrapped

      public cLoggingBase GetWrapped()
      Gets the currently wrapped logger instance.
